Rio_Rancho.Albuquerque International Balloon Fiesta: The Albuquerque International Balloon Fiesta is a yearly festival of hot air balloons that takes place in Albuquerque, New Mexico, United States during early October. The Balloon Fiesta is a nine-day event, and has over 500 balloons each year. The event is the largest hot air balloon festival in US. The largest hot air ballon festival is the Mondial Air Ballons in Lorraine, France.
